name: Body Horror Theme
description: Physical transformation, mutation, disease, the violation of the human form - where the body becomes the source of terror.

writing_rules.message: WARNING: This theme contains graphic descriptions of bodily transformation, mutation, and medical horror. Exposure may cause physical discomfort or visceral reactions.

Escape from {facility} as your {body_part} begins to {horrifying_transformation}. {gameplay_feature} makes this a race against your own flesh.
Investigate {outbreak} in {location} where {phenomenon} causes {bodily_horror}. {twist} reveals the true source of the infection.

body_horror_examples: skin that sloughs off like wet paper, revealing something beneath that shouldn't be seen
bones that reshape themselves into impossible geometries, creating new appendages
organs that develop independent consciousness and try to escape the body
limbs that elongate and split into new, functional segments
eyes that melt and reform with new, alien pupils that see different spectra
muscle tissue that liquefies and reforms into new, unnatural structures
nervous system that rewires itself, creating new senses that overload the brain
